key_risks: Cybersecurity risks due to payment processing role
Regulatory and compliance challenges in a highly regulated industry
Market competition from other technology providers and payment processors
Dependence on cashless adoption for growth
controversies: SEC charges for accounting fraud related to improper revenue recognition practices (2017-2018)
social_issues: Reliance on customer data for operations, necessitating ongoing vigilance to maintain trust
governance_issues: Concerns about internal controls and financial transparency due to past accounting fraud
